project.name: Beaver Lead Contractor Integration
project.description: Integrate startd8 SDK Lead Contractor workflow with ContextCore task tracking

tasks.title: Add workflow run endpoint to Rabbit API
tasks.description: Implement POST /api/run endpoint in ContextCore Rabbit API to trigger the Lead Contractor workflow. Should accept task_description, task_id, project_id, and drafter_agent parameters.

tasks.title: Implement workflow status endpoint
tasks.description: Implement GET /api/workflows/{id}/status endpoint for real-time workflow progress updates. Return current phase, progress percentage, and any errors.

tasks.title: Add workflow history endpoint
tasks.description: Implement GET /api/workflows endpoint to list completed workflow runs with duration, cost, and outcome. Support filtering by project_id and date range.

tasks.title: Update Workflow Manager trigger panel
tasks.description: Configure the Trigger Workflow button panel in workflow.json to call POST /api/run with the selected task parameters.

tasks.title: Add workflow status panel
tasks.description: Add a panel to show active workflow progress including current phase (spec/draft/review/integration), iteration count, and elapsed time.

tasks.title: Add workflow history panel
tasks.description: Add a panel to display completed workflow runs with task title, duration, total cost, agent breakdown, and success/failure status.

tasks.title: Test ContextCore task tracking integration
tasks.description: Verify that running LeadContractorContextCoreWorkflow creates task spans in Tempo with correct status transitions and events.

tasks.title: Add insight emission for workflow decisions
tasks.description: Emit InsightEmitter decisions for spec creation approach and review verdicts. Include confidence scores and context.

tasks.title: Add cost tracking metrics
tasks.description: Emit LLM cost as span attributes including total_cost, input_tokens, output_tokens per agent, and per-phase breakdown.

tasks.title: Update CLAUDE.md with Beaver integration
tasks.description: Add documentation to CLAUDE.md explaining how to use the Lead Contractor workflow with ContextCore task tracking.

tasks.title: Create workflow usage guide
tasks.description: Create end-to-end guide in docs/ showing how to run Lead Contractor from Workflow Manager dashboard with examples.
